channel.title: networking on tonibeck.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in networking on tonibeck.github.io

item.title: Aviatrix Certified Engineer (ACE) Professional
item.description: I recently went through the professional certification from Aviatrix. It’s a great way for all IT professionals to expand their knowledge in Cloud Infrastructure and Networking. The certification is valuable for all roles, whether at a systems integrator or partner, end customer, or as a technical role at a Cloud Service Provider (CSP).

item.title: Direction Multi-Cloud: Joining Aviatrix
item.description:
The cloud market is developing at great speed. I had two great, successful years as a Solution Architect at Microsoft. Microsoft has a fantastic team, great customers and outstanding momentum with Azure.

It was a great time with personal growth and definitely a whole lot of learnings. In 2022, however, I have decided to take the experience I have gained and transfer into a new role at Aviatrix in EMEA. Here is why I think this is the right move.

item.title: Unifi Network Controller on Azure
item.description: Unifi Networking with the controller hosted on Azure - a simple and powerful approach to a Home Network.
